title: NEED HELP
body: I cant open league of legends. Says there's a problem , it cant run on windows. or there's an error in the files. I tried downloading the game 5 times , but the same thing happens . can someone help me

replies.body: It says error status 0xc000020 to be specific . hope this helps

> [{quoted}](name=LL Deku,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5LAJUxpG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-06T21:35:04.209+0000)
>
> It says error status 0xc000020 to be specific . hope this helps

I made a thread about this and the answered with the fix You have to go to you riot games folder delete the client, then launch the lol.admin.exe

That might be happening from some kind of odd permissions error. Double check that your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and setup so that League can access it's game files, and let me know if that doesn't help.
